name: Alakazam
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokemon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Blastoise
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach 1 Water Energy card to 1 of your Water Pokemon. (This doesn't use up your 1 Energy card attachment for the turn.) This power can't be used if Blastoise is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd doesn't count.

name: Chansey
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Chansey during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Chansey does 80 damage to itself.

name: Charizard
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

name: Clefairy
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type the Defending Pokemon is, Clefairy's type is still Colorless.)

name: Gyarados
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Machamp
AbilityText: Whenever your opponent's attack damages Machamp (even if Machamp is Knocked Out), this power does 10 damage to the attacking Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power can't be used if Machamp is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when your opponent attacks.

name: Magneton
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magneton does 80 damage to itself.

name: Mewtwo
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo during your opponent's next turn.

name: Nidoking
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

name: Ninetales
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Ninetales in order to use this attack.

name: Poliwrath
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Poliwrath but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd doesn't count.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Raichu
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Raichu.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Raichu does 30 damage to itself.

name: Venusaur
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

name: Zapdos
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos in order to use this attack.

name: Beedrill
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Dragonair
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Dugtrio
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Electabuzz
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage plus Electabuzz does 10 damage to itself.

name: Electrode
AbilityText: At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may Knock Out Electrode and attach it to 1 of your other Pokemon. If you do, choose a type of Energy. Electrode is now an Energy card (instead of a Pokemon) that provides 2 energy of that type. You can't use this power if Electrode is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Electrode does 10 damage to itself.

name: Pidgeotto
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If Pidgeotto was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Pidgeotto to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Arcanine
Attack1Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Arcanine in order to use this attack.
Attack2Text: Arcanine does 30 damage to itself.

name: Charmeleon
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon in order to use this attack.

name: Dewgong
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Farfetch'd
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. Either way, you can't use this attack again as long as Farfetch'd stays in play (even putting Farfetch'd on the Bench won't let you use it again).

name: Haunter
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: You can't use this attack unless the Defending Pokemon is Asleep.

name: Ivysaur
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Jynx
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Kadabra
Attack1Text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Kadabra in order to use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Kadabra.

name: Kakuna
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Kakuna during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Machoke
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Machoke.
Attack2Text: Machoke does 20 damage to itself.

name: Magikarp
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Magikarp.

name: Magmar
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Magmar in order to use this attack.

name: Nidorino
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Poliwhirl
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Porygon
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon has a Weakness, you may change it to a type of your choice other than Colorless.
Attack2Text: Change Porygon's Resistance to a type of your choice other than Colorless.

name: Raticate
Attack2Text: Does damage to the Defending Pokemon equal to half the Defending Pokemon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).

name: Wartortle
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Wartortle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Abra
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Bulbasaur
Attack1Text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Bulbasaur.

name: Caterpie
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Charmander
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmander in order to use this attack.

name: Doduo
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Drowzee
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Gastly
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Gastly in order to use this attack. If a Pokemon Knocks Out Gastly during your opponent's next turn, Knock Out that Pokemon.

name: Koffing
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned; if tails, it is now Confused.

name: Magnemite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magnemite does 40 damage to itself.

name: Metapod
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Onix
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or less damage is done to Onix (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Pidgey
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

name: Pikachu
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

name: Poliwag
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Poliwag but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd don't count.

name: Sandshrew
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Squirtle
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Squirtle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Starmie
Attack1Text: Discard 1 Water Energy card attached to Starmie in order to use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Starmie.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Tangela
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
